summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 7%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 908 m), feels like temperature (up 1.8°C), outside temperature (up 1.6°C), and light levels (down 2860 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 585.2m higher than yesterday, 306.0m lower than the past week, 908.2m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1850.8m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2160m and 2760m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, a humid atmosphere. Chance of light rain, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and very bright daylight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
